department.dept_long_name: Division of Engineering and Applied Sciences

course.title: Water and Economic Development
course.description: The course focuses on the engineering, infrastructure and institutions needed to manage water on a basin and city scale. The course does this using the case study method. All cases are presented by practitioners who have had deep engagement with the cases.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Kennedy School as IGA 435 and with Public Health as EH524.
